QuestData.Title: Ethel Rethor
QuestData.Description: We have recently received a plea for help from a researcher of the Cenarion Circle.$b$bWe have no one we can spare to send, so I ask that you pay her a visit on our behalf.$b$bKorrah is posted near the ruined tower of Ethel Rethor, on the coast to the west.
QuestData.LogDescription: Corporal Melkins wants you to speak to Korrah at Ethel Rethor.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good that you have come.$b$bThere is grave danger looming here.
